name: Dog Image & Breed Database
description: Random dog images and comprehensive breed information from Dog CEO API

metadata.notes: Primary dog image endpoint; loader/executor will attempt to parse returned JSON and render sample breeds by calling additional endpoints if needed.
metadata.longDescription:
Title: Dog Image & Breed Database

Summary: Returns random dog images and breed information from the Dog CEO API.

What I can read: Live HTTP endpoint at https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random and related breed endpoints.

What I can do: Provide a sample image URL, lookup breed details, and show example API responses.

How to ask: "Show a random dog image"; "What breeds are available?"

Limitations: This is a live HTTP data source and not a pre-seeded textual knowledge skill.
